SELECT
,coupon_user.`id` coupon_user_id
,null coupon_user_id
FROM coupon_info coupon_info
LEFT JOIN coupon_goods coupon_goods ON coupon_info.`id` = coupon_goods.`coupon_id`
LEFT JOIN coupon_user coupon_user ON coupon_info.`id` = coupon_user.`coupon_id` AND coupon_user.`user_id` = #{query3.userId} AND coupon_user.`status` = '0' AND coupon_user.`valid_end_time` > now()
AND coupon_info.`enable` = '1' AND ( coupon_info.`expire_type` = '1' OR (coupon_info.`expire_type` = '2' AND coupon_info.`valid_end_time` > now()) ) AND coupon_info.`stock` > 0
AND ( coupon_info.`suit_type` = '1' OR (coupon_info.`suit_type` = '2' AND coupon_goods.`spu_id` = #{query2.spuId}) )
